Job title: Licensed Heavy Duty Mechanic 421A or 310T
Posting date: 7/19/2018
Job Location: Toronto
Company: Melrose Paving
Entry point: https://www.engineerjobs.com/jobdetails.php?lnk=RUawtEMZIP8uOJYDNoMqoDuLl5J0KXSEi94gn3y5QdwkEP6qsuwa3YJZOqK4XD1pVPYifhARfRFcSYvggz6l4eFFMQ3tsXQH3wJqpld2M19ToOQvuODaKU3BRhy7yWyUJnsXuaZ7jlk35wezgCVNelyK_qcnnmuY3KioZ2jqS43kOHgP79pGEG0E2CzY3OcUZMwEpnmZgmQVu7aUMKiWQvFEe4uA7j0rwL7fuGJrAsEr-9M57WFmV2W2aNXalKaeZjbLyYrUQDG8WcSzvbiGnAT6n4u4WymtUZmy4jDmzj5basrc1-tDenstejCiVjs0DgeI_35CXgkg00ZplSUa7w87X8J3oZHZ6hl0w4aYFFvwGgyZ1P7sFmVDHLdALvcsV3ZWCmsnEvaGH9j7CZwtGSuGDHjHn3czEcQWFReXWPpA8nRyz30tMOTfqUUJ2fFmC_5StG08qUtSZAwjzsTAcA40aoNyHCexDxpFAWDJpzoZ17MIp6Qdq3Ml7UlyjqfY5hxAPMqWFcu0lW8Z1_-RP4MTlghnGh_JGm4esSYjZ43SI9zN-rUxQhTPpkJW8KztGprJQl5l5zcr7SE0DfiG3QvSkg&isp=0&el=%2Fjobs%2Fsoftware-engineering%2Fcanada%2Fontario%2F%3Ff%3D1%26page%3D9&jk=0UXh9O66w-TMISYryYy_EFMhIh_Dj9rq1sVpjVmwhfRsTJZP5mtLuw
Job ID: 199
Raw description:  Running repair on off road heavy trucks. Repairs on bulldozers, graders, dump truck and excavators. Will require ability to troubleshoot and inspect equipment to detect faults and malfunctions, determine extent of repair required, adjust equipment and repair or replace defective parts. Mobile repairs on the road is required. Keep maintenance reports and documentation. Maintain clean shop. 421A Heavy Equipment License 1-2 years considered Valid driver’s license with a clean driver’s abstract. Must have necessary hand tools.
